name: Tanker (itch) (Tom Rafferty)
description:
'Tanker' is a short arcadey game I made in a few days (total - over the course of a week or so) and is heavily inspired by 'Space Invaders' as you probably guessed. I planned to add a lot more content to the game but at least for now I think this is the end for 'Tanker'. Enjoy and let me know your score in the comments, feedback is also greatly appreciated!

font by: Daniel Linssen (m5x7)
